class.name: Ranger

default: (a) two {@item shortsword|phb|shortswords} or (b) two {@filter simple melee weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon;melee weapon=u~u~sand}
(a) a {@item dungeoneer's pack|phb} or (b) an {@item explorer's pack|phb}
A {@item longbow|phb} and a {@item quiver|phb} of {@item arrows (20)|phb|20 arrows}

classFeatures: Favored Enemy and Natural Explorer improvements|Ranger||6

fluff.name: Ranger
entries: 一个看起来粗野的人类独自漫步在树影中，猎杀他知道正在计划袭击附近农场的兽人。他双手紧握短剑，变成一股钢铁旋风，砍倒一个又一个敌人。
在从冰冷的空气中翻滚开来后，一个精灵找到了她的脚，拉开她的弓，向白龙放箭。甩开从龙身上散发出来的恐惧浪潮，就像龙的呼吸的寒冷一样，她发出一支又一支的箭，寻找龙厚厚的鳞片之间的缝隙。
半精灵把手举得高高的，对着高空盘旋的鹰吹口哨，召唤鸟儿回到他身边。他用精灵语低声指示，指向他一直在追踪的猫头鹰，并派鹰去引开那只动物，同时他准备好他的弓。
远离城市和城镇的喧嚣，越过为最遥远的农场提供庇护的篱笆，使其免受野生动物的威胁，在无轨森林的密集树木中，以及在宽阔空旷的平原上，护林员保持着无尽的警惕。

entries.name: Deadly Hunters
entries: 游骑兵是荒野的勇士，他们专门猎杀威胁文明边缘的怪物--人形突袭者、横冲直撞的野兽和怪兽、可怕的巨人和致命的巨龙。他们学会了像捕食者一样追踪他们的猎物，在荒野中隐秘地移动，把自己藏在灌木和瓦砾中。游骑兵将他们的战斗训练集中在对他们所喜欢的特定敌人特别有用的技术上。
由于他们对荒野的熟悉，游骑兵获得了施展法术的能力，利用自然的力量，就像德鲁伊那样。他们的法术和他们的战斗能力一样，强调速度、隐蔽性和狩猎。游侠的天赋和能力在保护边境地区的严峻任务中得到了致命的磨练。

entries.name: Independent Adventurers
entries: 虽然游侠可能以猎人、向导或追踪者为生，但游侠真正的使命是保卫文明的郊区，免受从野外涌来的怪物和人形大军的蹂躏。在一些地方，游侠们聚集在秘密的秩序中，或者与德鲁伊教派的圈子联合起来。然而，许多游骑兵几乎是独立的，他们知道，当一条龙或一队兽人进攻时，游骑兵可能是第一道，也可能是最后一道防线。
这种强烈的独立性使游侠很适合冒险，因为他们已经习惯了远离干爽的床和热水澡的舒适生活。面对那些在城市长大的冒险家，他们对野外的艰难困苦喋喋不休，游侠们的反应是混合着欢笑、沮丧和同情的。但他们很快就知道，其他能够在与文明的敌人的斗争中承担自己的重量的冒险者是值得任何额外负担的。娇生惯养的城市人可能不知道如何养活自己或在野外寻找淡水，但他们在其他方面弥补了这一点。

entries.name: Creating a Ranger
entries: 当你创建游侠角色时，考虑赋予你特殊能力的训练的性质。你是否和一个导师一起训练，一起在荒野中游荡，直到你掌握了游侠的方法？你是否离开了你的学徒生涯，或者你的导师被杀了--也许是被成为你最喜欢的敌人的那种怪物所杀？或者你是作为隶属于德鲁伊教派的游侠队伍中的一员而学会了你的技能，在神秘的道路和荒野的传说中接受训练。你可能是自学成才，一个隐居者，通过在荒野中生存的需要，学会了战斗技巧、追踪，甚至与自然的神奇联系。
你对某类敌人的特别仇恨的来源是什么？是一个怪物杀死了你所爱的人或摧毁了你的家乡？还是你看到了太多这些怪物造成的破坏，并承诺要控制它们的掠夺行为？你的冒险生涯是你保护边疆的工作的延续，还是一个重大的改变？是什么让你加入了一个冒险者的队伍？你是觉得向新盟友传授野外生存之道是一种挑战，还是欢迎他们提供的孤独的解脱？

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a ranger quickly by following these suggestions. First, make Dexterity your highest ability score, followed by Wisdom. (Some rangers who focus on two-weapon fighting make Strength higher than Dexterity.) Second, choose the {@background outlander} background.
我花了很多时间远离文明，守在文明的边缘来保护它。不要以为我不向你的国王屈膝，就认为我为保护他所做的事比他所有的骑士加起来还多。
游骑兵是思想自由的流浪者和寻求者，他们在文明地区的边缘巡逻，将野地的居民拒之门外。这是一份不遗余力的工作，因为他们的努力很少被理解，也几乎从未得到过回报。然而，护林员坚持他们的职责，从不怀疑他们的工作使世界变得更加安全。
与文明的关系影响着每个游骑兵的个性和历史。有些游骑兵认为自己是法律的执行者，是文明边界上的正义使者，不听从任何主权国家的命令。其他人则是完全摒弃文明的生存主义者。他们消灭怪物以保证自己的安全，同时他们生活在世界危险的野外地区并在那里旅行。如果他们的努力也有利于他们所避免的王国和其他文明领域，那就这样吧。
如果你正在创建或扮演一个游侠角色，下面的章节提供了美化角色和增强你的角色扮演经验的想法。

entries.name: View of the World
entries: 一个游骑兵对世界的看法始于（有时也终于）该角色对文明人和他们所居住的地方的看法。有些游骑兵对文明的态度是根深蒂固的蔑视，而有些游骑兵则怜悯他们发誓要保护的人--尽管在战场上，不可能分辨出一个游骑兵和另一个游骑兵的区别。事实上，对于那些见过他们行动并成为他们能力的受益者的人来说，游骑兵为什么要做他们所做的事几乎不重要。也就是说，没有两个游骑兵可能会以相同的方式表达他们对任何问题的看法。
如果你还没有考虑到你的角色的世界观的细节，可以考虑把事情做得更细，把这个观点概括在一个简短的声明中（比如下表中的条目）。这种感觉会如何影响你的行为方式？

entries.caption: View of the World
rows: 城镇和城市是那些不能独立生存的人的最佳场所。
文明的进步是挫败混乱的最佳途径，但其影响范围必须受到监控。
城镇和城市是一种必要的邪恶，但是一旦荒野上的超自然威胁被清除，我们就不再需要它们了。
墙是为懦夫准备的，他们蜷缩在墙后面，而其他人却在做使世界安全的工作。
参观一个城镇并不令人不快，但几天后，我感到有一种不可抗拒的召唤，要回到野外。
城市将人们与野外的严酷教训隔离开来，从而滋生了弱点。

entries.name: Homelands
entries: 所有护林员，无论他们是如何从事这一职业的，都与自然界及其各种地形有着密切的联系。对于一些护林员来说，荒野是他们成长的地方，要么是出生在那里，要么是在年轻的时候搬到那里。对其他护林员来说，文明原本是他们的家，但荒野成为他们的第二故乡。
想一想你的角色的背景故事，决定什么地形最像你的家，无论你是否出生在那里。这种地形对你的性格有什么影响？它是否影响你选择学习哪些法术？你在那里的经历是否塑造了你最喜欢的敌人是谁？

entries.caption: Homelands
rows: 你在一个古老的森林里巡逻，由于几次穿越到阴影地带而变得黑暗和腐朽。
作为一群游牧民族的一部分，你获得了在沙漠中生存的技能。
你早年在暗黑世界的生活为你准备好了对抗暗黑世界居民的挑战。
你住在沼泽的边缘，在一个受到陆地生物和水生生物威胁的地区。
因为你是在山峰间长大的，对你来说，找到穿越山脉的最佳路径是你的第二天性。
你在遥远的北方游荡，学习如何保护自己，并在一个被冰雪覆盖的王国里繁荣发展。

entries.name: Sworn Enemy
entries: 每个游侠开始时都有一个（或两个）喜欢的敌人。敌人的确定可能与角色早期生活中的特定事件有关，也可能完全是一个选择问题。
是什么刺激了你的角色选择一个特定的敌人？是由于传统或好奇心而做出的选择，还是你有怨恨要解决？

entries.caption: Sworn Enemies
rows: 你代表自然界为你的敌人所犯的巨大过错寻求报复。
你们的祖先或前辈与这些生物作战，你们也应如此。
你对你的敌人没有敌意。你跟踪这种生物，就像猎人跟踪野生动物一样。
你发现你的敌人很迷人，你收集有关它的故事和历史书籍。
你收集你死去的敌人的信物，以提醒你每次的杀戮。
你尊重你选择的敌人，你将你的战斗视为对各自技能的考验。

class.name: Ranger (Spell-less)

你尊重你选择的敌人，你将你的战斗视为对各自技能的考验。

default: (a) two {@item shortsword|phb|shortswords} or (b) two {@filter martial melee weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon;melee weapon=u~u~sand} or (c) a {@filter martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon} and a {@item shield|phb}
(a) a {@item dungeoneer's pack|phb} or (b) an {@item explorer's pack|phb}
(a) a {@item longbow|phb} and a {@item quiver|phb} of {@item arrows (20)|phb|20 arrows} or (b) a {@filter martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon}
(a) two {@item shortsword|phb|shortswords} or (b) two {@filter simple melee weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon;melee weapon=u~u~sand}
(a) a {@item dungeoneer's pack|phb} or (b) an {@item explorer's pack|phb}
A {@item longbow|phb} and a {@item quiver|phb} of {@item arrows (20)|phb|20 arrows}

fluff.name: Ranger
entries: 一个看起来粗野的人类独自漫步在树影中，猎杀他知道正在计划袭击附近农场的兽人。他双手紧握短剑，变成一股钢铁旋风，砍倒一个又一个敌人。
在从冰冷的空气中翻滚开来后，一个精灵找到了她的脚，拉开她的弓，向白龙放箭。甩开从龙身上散发出来的恐惧浪潮，就像龙的呼吸的寒冷一样，她发出一支又一支的箭，寻找龙厚厚的鳞片之间的缝隙。
半精灵把手举得高高的，对着高空盘旋的鹰吹口哨，召唤鸟儿回到他身边。他用精灵语低声指示，指向他一直在追踪的猫头鹰，并派鹰去引开那只动物，同时他准备好他的弓。
远离城市和城镇的喧嚣，越过为最遥远的农场提供庇护的篱笆，使其免受野生动物的威胁，在无轨森林的密集树木中，以及在宽阔空旷的平原上，护林员保持着无尽的警惕。

entries.name: Deadly Hunters
entries: 游骑兵是荒野的勇士，他们专门猎杀威胁文明边缘的怪物--人形突袭者、横冲直撞的野兽和怪兽、可怕的巨人和致命的巨龙。他们学会了像捕食者一样追踪他们的猎物，在荒野中隐秘地移动，把自己藏在灌木和瓦砾中。游骑兵将他们的战斗训练集中在对他们所喜欢的特定敌人特别有用的技术上。
由于他们对荒野的熟悉，游骑兵获得了施展法术的能力，利用自然的力量，就像德鲁伊那样。他们的法术和他们的战斗能力一样，强调速度、隐蔽性和狩猎。游侠的天赋和能力在保护边境地区的严峻任务中得到了致命的磨练。

entries.name: Independent Adventurers
entries: 虽然游侠可能以猎人、向导或追踪者为生，但游侠真正的使命是保卫文明的郊区，免受从野外涌来的怪物和人形大军的蹂躏。在一些地方，游侠们聚集在秘密的秩序中，或者与德鲁伊教派的圈子联合起来。然而，许多游骑兵几乎是独立的，他们知道，当一条龙或一队兽人进攻时，游骑兵可能是第一道，也可能是最后一道防线。
这种强烈的独立性使游侠很适合冒险，因为他们已经习惯了远离干爽的床和热水澡的舒适生活。面对那些在城市长大的冒险家，他们对野外的艰难困苦喋喋不休，游侠们的反应是混合着欢笑、沮丧和同情的。但他们很快就知道，其他能够在与文明的敌人的斗争中承担自己的重量的冒险者是值得任何额外负担的。娇生惯养的城市人可能不知道如何养活自己或在野外寻找淡水，但他们在其他方面弥补了这一点。

entries.name: Creating a Ranger
entries: 当你创建游侠角色时，考虑赋予你特殊能力的训练的性质。你是否和一个导师一起训练，一起在荒野中游荡，直到你掌握了游侠的方法？你是否离开了你的学徒生涯，或者你的导师被杀了--也许是被成为你最喜欢的敌人的那种怪物所杀？或者你是作为隶属于德鲁伊教派的游侠队伍中的一员而学会了你的技能，在神秘的道路和荒野的传说中接受训练。你可能是自学成才，一个隐居者，通过在荒野中生存的需要，学会了战斗技巧、追踪，甚至与自然的神奇联系。
你对某类敌人的特别仇恨的来源是什么？是一个怪物杀死了你所爱的人或摧毁了你的家乡？还是你看到了太多这些怪物造成的破坏，并承诺要控制它们的掠夺行为？你的冒险生涯是你保护边疆的工作的延续，还是一个重大的改变？是什么让你加入了一个冒险者的队伍？你是觉得向新盟友传授野外生存之道是一种挑战，还是欢迎他们提供的孤独的解脱？

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a ranger quickly by following these suggestions. First, make Dexterity your highest ability score, followed by Wisdom. (Some rangers who focus on two-weapon fighting make Strength higher than Dexterity.) Second, choose the {@background outlander} background.
我花了很多时间远离文明，守在文明的边缘来保护它。不要以为我不向你的国王屈膝，就认为我为保护他所做的事比他所有的骑士加起来还多。
游骑兵是思想自由的流浪者和寻求者，他们在文明地区的边缘巡逻，将野地的居民拒之门外。这是一份不遗余力的工作，因为他们的努力很少被理解，也几乎从未得到过回报。然而，护林员坚持他们的职责，从不怀疑他们的工作使世界变得更加安全。
与文明的关系影响着每个游骑兵的个性和历史。有些游骑兵认为自己是法律的执行者，是文明边界上的正义使者，不听从任何主权国家的命令。其他人则是完全摒弃文明的生存主义者。他们消灭怪物以保证自己的安全，同时他们生活在世界危险的野外地区并在那里旅行。如果他们的努力也有利于他们所避免的王国和其他文明领域，那就这样吧。
如果你正在创建或扮演一个游侠角色，下面的章节提供了美化角色和增强你的角色扮演经验的想法。

entries.name: View of the World
entries: 一个游骑兵对世界的看法始于（有时也终于）该角色对文明人和他们所居住的地方的看法。有些游骑兵对文明的态度是根深蒂固的蔑视，而有些游骑兵则怜悯他们发誓要保护的人--尽管在战场上，不可能分辨出一个游骑兵和另一个游骑兵的区别。事实上，对于那些见过他们行动并成为他们能力的受益者的人来说，游骑兵为什么要做他们所做的事几乎不重要。也就是说，没有两个游骑兵可能会以相同的方式表达他们对任何问题的看法。
如果你还没有考虑到你的角色的世界观的细节，可以考虑把事情做得更细，把这个观点概括在一个简短的声明中（比如下表中的条目）。这种感觉会如何影响你的行为方式？

entries.caption: View of the World
rows: 城镇和城市是那些不能独立生存的人的最佳场所。
文明的进步是挫败混乱的最佳途径，但其影响范围必须受到监控。
城镇和城市是一种必要的邪恶，但是一旦荒野上的超自然威胁被清除，我们就不再需要它们了。
墙是为懦夫准备的，他们蜷缩在墙后面，而其他人却在做使世界安全的工作。
参观一个城镇并不令人不快，但几天后，我感到有一种不可抗拒的召唤，要回到野外。
城市将人们与野外的严酷教训隔离开来，从而滋生了弱点。

entries.name: Homelands
entries: 所有护林员，无论他们是如何从事这一职业的，都与自然界及其各种地形有着密切的联系。对于一些护林员来说，荒野是他们成长的地方，要么是出生在那里，要么是在年轻的时候搬到那里。对其他护林员来说，文明原本是他们的家，但荒野成为他们的第二故乡。
想一想你的角色的背景故事，决定什么地形最像你的家，无论你是否出生在那里。这种地形对你的性格有什么影响？它是否影响你选择学习哪些法术？你在那里的经历是否塑造了你最喜欢的敌人是谁？

entries.caption: Homelands
rows: 你在一个古老的森林里巡逻，由于几次穿越到阴影地带而变得黑暗和腐朽。
作为一群游牧民族的一部分，你获得了在沙漠中生存的技能。
你早年在暗黑世界的生活为你准备好了对抗暗黑世界居民的挑战。
你住在沼泽的边缘，在一个受到陆地生物和水生生物威胁的地区。
因为你是在山峰间长大的，对你来说，找到穿越山脉的最佳路径是你的第二天性。
你在遥远的北方游荡，学习如何保护自己，并在一个被冰雪覆盖的王国里繁荣发展。

entries.name: Sworn Enemy
entries: 每个游侠开始时都有一个（或两个）喜欢的敌人。敌人的确定可能与角色早期生活中的特定事件有关，也可能完全是一个选择问题。
是什么刺激了你的角色选择一个特定的敌人？是由于传统或好奇心而做出的选择，还是你有怨恨要解决？

entries.caption: Sworn Enemies
rows: 你代表自然界为你的敌人所犯的巨大过错寻求报复。
你们的祖先或前辈与这些生物作战，你们也应如此。
你对你的敌人没有敌意。你跟踪这种生物，就像猎人跟踪野生动物一样。
你发现你的敌人很迷人，你收集有关它的故事和历史书籍。
你收集你死去的敌人的信物，以提醒你每次的杀戮。
你尊重你选择的敌人，你将你的战斗视为对各自技能的考验。

subclass.name: Beast Conclave
subclassFeatures: Storm of Claw and Fangs|Ranger (Revised)|UATheRangerRevised|Beast Conclave|UATheRangerRevised|11

classFeature.name: Canny
entries: Choose one skill: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Athletics}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Stealth}, or {@skill Survival}. You gain proficiency in the chosen skill if you don't already have it, and you can add double your proficiency bonus to ability checks using that skill.
此外，由于你的广泛游走，你能够说、读、写两种你选择的语言。

classFeature.name: Deft Explorer
entries: {@i 1st-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}, which replaces the Natural Explorer feature}
你是一个无与伦比的探险家和幸存者，无论是在荒野中还是在旅行中与他人打交道。你获得以下的 "狡猾 "属性，当你达到6级和10级时，你将获得以下的额外属性。

entries.name: Canny
entries: 选择你的一个技能熟练度。在你进行任何使用所选技能的能力检查时，你的熟练度加成会翻倍。
你还可以说、读、写你选择的另外两种语言。

classFeature.name: Deft Explorer
entries: {@i 1st-level ranger feature (replaces Natural Explorer)}
你是一个无与伦比的探险家和生存者。从以下好处中选择一个，然后在6级和10级时再选择一个。

classFeature.name: Favored Enemy
entries: 从1级开始，你有大量研究、追踪、狩猎的经验，甚至可以和某类敌人交谈。

Choose a type of favored enemy: {@filter aberrations|bestiary|type=aberration}, {@filter beasts|bestiary|type=beast}, {@filter celestials|bestiary|type=celestial}, {@filter constructs|bestiary|type=construct}, {@filter dragons|bestiary|type=dragon}, {@filter elementals|bestiary|type=elemental}, {@filter fey|bestiary|type=fey}, {@filter fiends|bestiary|type=fiend}, {@filter giants|bestiary|type=giant}, {@filter monstrosities|bestiary|type=monstrosity}, {@filter oozes|bestiary|type=ooze}, {@filter plants|bestiary|type=plant}, or {@filter undead|bestiary|type=undead}. Alternatively, you can select two races of {@filter humanoid|bestiary|type=humanoid} (such as {@creature gnoll||gnolls} and {@creature orc||orcs}) as favored enemies.
You have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to track your favored enemies, as well as on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.
当你获得这个功能时，你也会学习一种你所选择的语言，如果他们说的是你所喜欢的敌人的语言。
你在6级和14级时可以选择一个额外的喜爱的敌人，以及一种相关的语言。随着你等级的提高，你的选择应该反映你在冒险中遇到的怪物类型。

classFeature.name: Favored Foe
entries: {@i 1st-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}, which replaces the Favored Enemy feature and works with the Foe Slayer feature}

When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can call on your mystical bond with nature to mark the target as your favored enemy for 1 minute or until you lose your {@status concentration} (as if you were {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).
The first time on each of your turns that you hit the favored enemy and deal damage to it, including when you mark it, you can increase that damage by {@dice 1d4}.
你可以使用这个功能来标记一个喜欢的敌人，次数与你的熟练度加成相等，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。
This feature's extra damage increases when you reach certain levels in this class: to {@dice 1d6} at 6th level and to {@dice 1d8} at 14th level.

classFeature.name: Favored Foe
entries: {@i 1st-level ranger feature (replaces Favored Enemy)}

You can call on your bond with nature to mark a creature as your favored enemy for a time: you know the {@spell hunter's mark} spell, and Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it. You can use it a certain number of times without expending a spell slot and without requiring {@status concentration}—a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (a minimum of once). You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
当你在2级时获得法术功能时，猎人的标记不会被计入你所知道的游侠法术数量。

classFeature.name: Natural Explorer
entries: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment and are adept at traveling and surviving in such regions. Choose one type of favored terrain: arctic, coast, desert, forest, grassland, mountain, swamp, or the Underdark. When you make an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to your favored terrain, your proficiency bonus is doubled if you are using a skill that you're proficient in.
当在你喜欢的地形中旅行一小时或更长时间时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 困难的地形不会减缓你的团队的旅行。
除非用魔法手段，否则你的小组不可能迷路。
即使你在旅行中从事另一项活动（如觅食、导航或追踪），你仍然对危险保持警惕。
如果你是独自旅行，你可以以正常的速度隐秘地移动。
当你觅食时，你会找到比平时多一倍的食物。
在追踪其他生物的同时，你还可以了解它们的确切数量、大小以及它们多久前经过该地区。

entries: 你在6级和10级的时候可以选择额外的喜欢的地形类型。

classFeature.name: Roving
entries: 你的步行速度增加5，并获得与你的步行速度相等的攀爬速度和游泳速度。

classFeature.name: Tireless
entries: As an action, you can give yourself a number of temporary hit points equal to {@dice 1d10} + your Wisdom modifier. You can use this special action a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (a minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
In addition, whenever you finish a short rest, your {@condition exhaustion} level, if any, is decreased by 1.

classFeature.name: Fighting Style
entries: 2级时，你采用一种特殊的战斗方式作为你的专长。从以下选项中选择一个。你不能多次选择一种格斗风格的选项，即使你后来可以再次选择。

classFeature.name: Martial Versatility
entries: {@i 2nd-level feature (enhances Fighting Style)}
每当你在这个班级中获得一个等级，你就可以用你班级中可用的另一种风格取代你所知道的一种战斗风格。这种变化代表着你的武术训练和练习重点的转移，使你失去一种风格的好处而获得另一种风格的好处。

classFeature.name: Spell Versatility
entries: {@i 2nd-level ranger feature (enhances Spellcasting)}
每当你完成一次长时休息，你可以用游侠法术列表中的另一个法术来替换你从这个法术功能中学到的一个法术。新的法术必须与你替换的法术同等级。

classFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: By the time you reach 2nd level, you have learned to use the magical essence of nature to cast spells, much as a druid does. See {@book chapter 10|PHB|10} for the general rules of spellcasting and {@book chapter 11|PHB|11} for the {@filter ranger spell list|spells|class=ranger}.

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: The Ranger table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your {@filter ranger spells|spells|class=ranger} of 1st level and higher. To cast one of these spells, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a long rest.
For example, if you know the 1st-level spell {@spell animal friendship} and have a 1st-level and a 2nd-level spell slot available, you can cast {@spell animal friendship} using either slot.

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st Level and Higher
entries: 你会从游侠的法术列表中选择两个一级法术。
游侠表中的 "已知法术 "一栏显示了你何时学习更多你选择的游侠法术。每个法术都必须是你有法术槽的等级。例如，当你在这个等级中达到5级时，你可以学习一个1级或2级的新法术。
此外，当你在这个等级中获得一个等级时，你可以从你所知道的游侠法术中选择一个，并用游侠法术列表中的另一个法术来代替它，这个法术也必须是你有法术槽的等级。

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your ranger spells, since your magic draws on your attunement to nature. You use your Wisdom whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. In addition, you use your Wisdom modifier when setting the saving throw DC for a ranger spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.

classFeature.name: Spellcasting Focus
entries: {@i 2nd-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}}

You can use a {@item druidic focus|phb} as a spellcasting focus for your ranger spells. A druidic focus might be a sprig of mistletoe or holly, a wand or rod made of yew or another special wood, a staff drawn whole from a living tree, or an object incorporating feathers, fur, bones, and teeth from sacred animals.

classFeature.name: Spellcasting Focus
entries: {@i 2nd-level ranger feature (enhances Spellcasting)}
You can use a {@item druidic focus|phb} as a spellcasting focus for your ranger spells. See chapter 5, "Equipment," of the Player's Handbook for a list of things that count as druidic focuses.

classFeature.name: Primal Awareness
entries: {@i 3rd-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}, which replaces the Primeval Awareness feature}

You can focus your awareness through the interconnections of nature: you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class if you don't already know them, as shown in the Primal Awareness Spells table. These spells don't count against the number of ranger spells you know.
你可以在不耗费法术槽的情况下施放一次这些法术。一旦你以这种方式施放了一个法术，你就不能再这样做，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

classFeature.name: Primal Awareness
entries: {@i 3rd-level ranger feature (replaces Primeval Awareness)}

You can focus your awareness through the interconnections of nature: you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class if you don't already know them, as shown in the Primal Awareness Spells table. These spells don't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.caption: Primal Awareness Spells
rows: {@spell beast sense}, {@spell locate animals or plants}

entries: 你可以在不耗费法术槽的情况下施放一次这些法术。一旦你以这种方式施放了一个法术，你就不能再这样做，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

classFeature.name: Primeval Awareness
entries: Beginning at 3rd level, you can use your action and expend one ranger spell slot to focus your awareness on the region around you. For 1 minute per level of the spell slot you expend, you can sense whether the following types of creatures are present within 1 mile of you (or within up to 6 miles if you are in your favored terrain): aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. This feature doesn't reveal the creatures' location or number.

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype
entries: 在3级时，你从可用的原型列表中选择一个你努力模仿的原型。你的选择在第3级时授予特性，并在第7、11和15级时再次授予特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到四级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Martial Versatility
entries: {@i 4th-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}}
每当你在这个等级中达到授予能力值提升功能的等级时，你可以用游骑兵可用的另一种战斗方式来替换你所知道的战斗方式。这种替换代表了你在武术练习中的重心转移。

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 4th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn.

classFeature.name: Deft Explorer Improvement
entries: 当你在这个等级达到6级时，你会获得一个额外的好处。

entries.name: Roving
entries: 你的步行速度增加5，并获得与你的步行速度相等的攀爬速度和游泳速度。

classFeature.name: Favored Enemy and Natural Explorer improvements
entries: 在6级时，你获得一个额外的偏爱地形。
在6级时，你可以额外选择一个喜欢的敌人，以及一种相关的语言。你的选择应该反映你在冒险中遇到的怪物类型。

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: 在7级时，你获得了游侠原型赋予你的一个特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Land's Stride
entries: Starting at 8th level, moving through nonmagical {@quickref difficult terrain||3} costs you no extra movement. You can also pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.
In addition, you have advantage on saving throws against plants that are magically created or manipulated to impede movement, such as those created by the {@spell entangle} spell.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 8th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Deft Explorer Improvement
entries: 当你在这个等级达到10级时，你会获得一个额外的好处。

entries.name: Tireless
entries: As an action, you can give yourself a number of temporary hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1 temporary hit point). You can use this action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
In addition, whenever you finish a short rest, your {@condition exhaustion} level, if any, is decreased by 1.

classFeature.name: Fade Away
entries: {@i 10th-level ranger feature (replaces Hide in Plain Sight)}
You can use a bonus action to magically become {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, until the start of your next turn.
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

classFeature.name: Hide in Plain Sight
entries: 从10级开始，你可以花1分钟为自己创造伪装。你必须有机会接触到新鲜的泥土、土壤、植物、烟尘和其他自然产生的材料，用它们来创造你的伪装。

Once you are camouflaged in this way, you can try to hide by pressing yourself up against a solid surface, such as a tree or wall, that is at least as tall and wide as you are. You gain a +10 bonus to Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks as long as you remain there without moving or taking actions. Once you move or take an action or a reaction, you must camouflage yourself again to gain this benefit.

classFeature.name: Natural Explorer improvement
entries: 你获得一个额外的有利地形。

classFeature.name: Nature's Veil
entries: {@i 10th-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}, which replaces the Hide in Plain Sight feature}

You draw on the powers of nature to hide yourself from view briefly. As a bonus action, you can magically become {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, until the start of your next turn.
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的熟练度加成相等，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: 在11级时，你获得一个由你的游侠原型赋予你的功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 12th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Favored Enemy improvement
entries: 在14级时，你可以额外选择一个喜欢的敌人，以及一种相关的语言。你的选择应该反映你在冒险中遇到的怪物类型。

classFeature.name: Vanish
entries: Starting at 14th level, you can use the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on your turn. Also, you can't be tracked by nonmagical means, unless you choose to leave a trail.

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: 15级时，你获得游侠原型赋予你的一项功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 16th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Feral Senses
entries: At 18th level, you gain preternatural senses that help you fight creatures you can't see. When you attack a creature you can't see, your inability to see it doesn't impose disadvantage on your attack rolls against it. You are also aware of the location of any {@condition invisible} creature within 30 feet of you, provided that the creature isn't hidden from you and you aren't {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 19th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Foe Slayer
entries: 在20级的时候，你成为了一个无与伦比的猎杀敌人的人。在你的每个回合中，你可以将你的智慧修饰值加到你对你所喜爱的一个敌人的攻击卷或伤害卷上。你可以选择在卷轴之前或之后使用这个功能，但在卷轴的任何效果被应用之前。

classFeature.name: Canny
entries: Choose one skill: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Athletics}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Stealth}, or {@skill Survival}. You gain proficiency in the chosen skill if you don't already have it, and you can add double your proficiency bonus to ability checks using that skill.
此外，由于你的广泛游走，你能够说、读、写两种你选择的语言。

classFeature.name: Deft Explorer
entries: {@i 1st-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}, which replaces the Natural Explorer feature}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
你是一个无与伦比的探险家和幸存者，无论是在荒野中还是在旅行中与他人打交道。你获得以下的 "狡猾 "属性，当你达到6级和10级时，你将获得以下的额外属性。

entries.name: Canny
entries: 选择你的一个技能熟练度。在你进行任何使用所选技能的能力检查时，你的熟练度加成会翻倍。
你还可以说、读、写你选择的另外两种语言。

classFeature.name: Deft Explorer
entries: {@i 1st-level ranger feature (replaces Natural Explorer)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
你是一个无与伦比的探险家和生存者。从以下好处中选择一个，然后在6级和10级时再选择一个。

classFeature.name: Favored Enemy
entries: 从1级开始，你有大量研究、追踪、狩猎的经验，甚至可以和某类敌人交谈。

Choose a type of favored enemy: {@filter aberrations|bestiary|type=aberration}, {@filter beasts|bestiary|type=beast}, {@filter celestials|bestiary|type=celestial}, {@filter constructs|bestiary|type=construct}, {@filter dragons|bestiary|type=dragon}, {@filter elementals|bestiary|type=elemental}, {@filter fey|bestiary|type=fey}, {@filter fiends|bestiary|type=fiend}, {@filter giants|bestiary|type=giant}, {@filter monstrosities|bestiary|type=monstrosity}, {@filter oozes|bestiary|type=ooze}, {@filter plants|bestiary|type=plant}, or {@filter undead|bestiary|type=undead}. Alternatively, you can select two races of {@filter humanoid|bestiary|type=humanoid} (such as {@creature gnoll||gnolls} and {@creature orc||orcs}) as favored enemies.
You have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to track your favored enemies, as well as on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.
当你获得这个功能时，你也会学习一种你所选择的语言，如果他们说的是你所喜欢的敌人的语言。
你在6级和14级时可以选择一个额外的喜爱的敌人，以及一种相关的语言。随着你等级的提高，你的选择应该反映你在冒险中遇到的怪物类型。

classFeature.name: Favored Foe
entries: {@i 1st-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}, which replaces the Favored Enemy feature and works with the Foe Slayer feature}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can call on your mystical bond with nature to mark the target as your favored enemy for 1 minute or until you lose your {@status concentration} (as if you were {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).
The first time on each of your turns that you hit the favored enemy and deal damage to it, including when you mark it, you can increase that damage by {@dice 1d4}.
你可以使用这个功能来标记一个喜欢的敌人，次数与你的熟练度加成相等，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。
This feature's extra damage increases when you reach certain levels in this class: to {@dice 1d6} at 6th level and to {@dice 1d8} at 14th level.

classFeature.name: Favored Foe
entries: {@i 1st-level ranger feature (replaces Favored Enemy)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

You can call on your bond with nature to mark a creature as your favored enemy for a time: you know the {@spell hunter's mark} spell, and Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it. You can use it a certain number of times without expending a spell slot and without requiring {@status concentration}—a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (a minimum of once). You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
当你在2级时获得法术功能时，猎人的标记不会被计入你所知道的游侠法术数量。

classFeature.name: Natural Explorer
entries: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment and are adept at traveling and surviving in such regions. Choose one type of favored terrain: arctic, coast, desert, forest, grassland, mountain, swamp, or the Underdark. When you make an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to your favored terrain, your proficiency bonus is doubled if you are using a skill that you're proficient in.
当在你喜欢的地形中旅行一小时或更长时间时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 困难的地形不会减缓你的团队的旅行。
除非用魔法手段，否则你的小组不可能迷路。
即使你在旅行中从事另一项活动（如觅食、导航或追踪），你仍然对危险保持警惕。
如果你是独自旅行，你可以以正常的速度隐秘地移动。
当你觅食时，你会找到比平时多一倍的食物。
在追踪其他生物的同时，你还可以了解它们的确切数量、大小以及它们多久前经过该地区。

entries: 你在6级和10级的时候可以选择额外的喜欢的地形类型。

classFeature.name: Roving
entries: 你的步行速度增加5，并获得与你的步行速度相等的攀爬速度和游泳速度。

classFeature.name: Tireless
entries: As an action, you can give yourself a number of temporary hit points equal to {@dice 1d10} + your Wisdom modifier. You can use this special action a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (a minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
In addition, whenever you finish a short rest, your {@condition exhaustion} level, if any, is decreased by 1.

classFeature.name: Combat Superiority
entries: 在2级时，你学会了由特殊骰子推动的机动性，这些骰子被称为优势骰子。

entries.name: Maneuvers
entries: You learn two {@filter maneuvers|optionalfeatures|feature type=mv:b} of your choice, which are chosen from the list of maneuvers available to fighters with the Battle Master archetype. Many maneuvers enhance an attack in some way. You can use only one maneuver per attack.
你在5级、9级、13级和17级时可以额外学习一种你选择的演习。每次你学习一个新动作时，你也可以用一个不同的动作代替你知道的一个动作。

entries.name: Superiority Dice
entries: You have four superiority dice, which are {@dice d8}s. A superiority die is expended when you use it. You regain all of your expended superiority dice when you finish a short or long rest.
你在9级时获得另一个优势模子，在17级时再获得一个。

entries.name: Saving Throws
entries: 你的某些演习需要你的目标做出一个蓄力动作来抵抗演习的效果。蓄力动作的计算方式如下。

classFeature.name: Fighting Style
entries: 2级时，你采用一种特殊的战斗方式作为你的专长。从以下选项中选择一个。你不能多次选择一种格斗风格的选项，即使你后来可以再次选择。

classFeature.name: Martial Versatility
entries: {@i 2nd-level feature (enhances Fighting Style)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
每当你在这个班级中获得一个等级，你就可以用你班级中可用的另一种风格取代你所知道的一种战斗风格。这种变化代表着你的武术训练和练习重点的转移，使你失去一种风格的好处而获得另一种风格的好处。

classFeature.name: Poultices
entries: 在3级时，你可以制作特殊的草药膏药，其治疗能力可与一些药水相媲美。你可以花1个小时收集草药，并使用经过处理的绷带制作草药膏药，其数量等于你的智慧修正值（最少1）。你可以在同一时间携带与你的智慧修饰值相同数量的膏药（最少为1）。除了你之外，任何人都不能使用你所创造的药膏。24小时后，任何你没有使用过的药膏都会失去药效。

If you spend 1 minute applying one of your poultices to a wounded humanoid creature, thereby expending its use, that creature regains {@dice 1d6} hit points for every two ranger levels you have (rounded up).

classFeature.name: Primal Awareness
entries: {@i 3rd-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}, which replaces the Primeval Awareness feature}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

You can focus your awareness through the interconnections of nature: you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class if you don't already know them, as shown in the Primal Awareness Spells table. These spells don't count against the number of ranger spells you know.
你可以在不耗费法术槽的情况下施放一次这些法术。一旦你以这种方式施放了一个法术，你就不能再这样做，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

classFeature.name: Primal Awareness
entries: {@i 3rd-level ranger feature (replaces Primeval Awareness)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

You can focus your awareness through the interconnections of nature: you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class if you don't already know them, as shown in the Primal Awareness Spells table. These spells don't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.caption: Primal Awareness Spells
rows: {@spell beast sense}, {@spell locate animals or plants}

entries: 你可以在不耗费法术槽的情况下施放一次这些法术。一旦你以这种方式施放了一个法术，你就不能再这样做，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

classFeature.name: Primeval Awareness
entries: Beginning at 3rd level, you can use your action to focus your awareness on the region around you. For the next minute, you can sense whether the following types of creatures are present within 1 mile of you (or within up to 6 miles if you are in your favored terrain): aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. This feature doesn't reveal the creatures' location or number.
一旦你使用这个功能，你必须完成一个短期或长期的休息，才能再次使用它。

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype
entries: 在3级时，你从可用的原型列表中选择一个你努力模仿的原型。你的选择在第3级时授予特性，并在第7、11和15级时再次授予特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到四级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Martial Versatility
entries: {@i 4th-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
每当你在这个等级中达到授予能力值提升功能的等级时，你可以用游骑兵可用的另一种战斗方式来替换你所知道的战斗方式。这种替换代表了你在武术练习中的重心转移。

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 4th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: 在5级时，你可以额外学习一种你选择的演习，该演习从战斗大师原型的战士可用的演习列表中选择。

classFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn.

classFeature.name: Deft Explorer Improvement
entries: 当你在这个等级达到6级时，你会获得一个额外的好处。

entries.name: Roving
entries: 你的步行速度增加5，并获得与你的步行速度相等的攀爬速度和游泳速度。

classFeature.name: Favored Enemy and Natural Explorer improvements
entries: 在6级时，你获得一个额外的偏爱地形。
在6级时，你可以额外选择一个喜欢的敌人，以及一种相关的语言。你的选择应该反映你在冒险中遇到的怪物类型。

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: 在7级时，你获得了游侠原型赋予你的一个特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Land's Stride
entries: Starting at 8th level, moving through nonmagical {@quickref difficult terrain||3} costs you no extra movement. You can also pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.
In addition, you have advantage on saving throws against plants that are magically created or manipulated to impede movement, such as those created by the {@spell entangle} spell.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 8th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: 在9级时，你可以额外学习一种你选择的演习，该演习从战斗大师原型的战士可用的演习列表中选择。

classFeature.name: Natural Antivenom
entries: 从9级开始，你对毒药的救赎有优势，并对毒药伤害有抵抗力。此外，你可以用你的一个膏药来治疗你正在使用的生物的一个毒药效果，除了恢复命中率之外。

classFeature.name: Deft Explorer Improvement
entries: 当你在这个等级达到10级时，你会获得一个额外的好处。

entries.name: Tireless
entries: As an action, you can give yourself a number of temporary hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1 temporary hit point). You can use this action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
In addition, whenever you finish a short rest, your {@condition exhaustion} level, if any, is decreased by 1.

classFeature.name: Fade Away
entries: {@i 10th-level ranger feature (replaces Hide in Plain Sight)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
You can use a bonus action to magically become {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, until the start of your next turn.
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

classFeature.name: Hide in Plain Sight
entries: 从10级开始，你可以花1分钟为自己创造伪装。你必须有机会接触到新鲜的泥土、土壤、植物、烟尘和其他自然产生的材料，用它们来创造你的伪装。

Once you are camouflaged in this way, you can try to hide by pressing yourself up against a solid surface, such as a tree or wall, that is at least as tall and wide as you are. You gain a +10 bonus to Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks as long as you remain there without moving or taking actions. Once you move or take an action or a reaction, you must camouflage yourself again to gain this benefit.

classFeature.name: Natural Explorer improvement
entries: 你获得一个额外的有利地形。

classFeature.name: Nature's Veil
entries: {@i 10th-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}, which replaces the Hide in Plain Sight feature}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

You draw on the powers of nature to hide yourself from view briefly. As a bonus action, you can magically become {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, until the start of your next turn.
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的熟练度加成相等，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: 在11级时，你获得一个由你的游侠原型赋予你的功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 12th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: 在13级时，你会额外学习一种你选择的演习，该演习会从战斗大师原型的战士可用的演习列表中选择。

classFeature.name: Call Natural Allies
entries: Starting at 13th level, when you are in an area of your favored terrain, you can call natural creatures from that terrain to fight on your behalf, using your attunement to the natural world to convince them to aid you. The DM chooses beasts appropriate to the terrain to come to your aid from among those that could hear you and that are within 1 mile of you, in one of the following groups:

items: 一个挑战等级为2级或更低的魔兽
两只挑战等级为1或更低的魔兽
四个挑战等级为1/2或更低的魔兽
八个挑战等级为1/4或更低的魔兽

entries: These beasts approach you from their current location, and will fight alongside you, attacking any creatures that are hostile to you. They are friendly to you and your comrades, and you roll initiative for the called creatures as a group, which takes its own turns. The DM has the creatures' statistics.
1小时后，这些野兽会回到它们之前的位置。一旦你使用这个功能，24小时内你不能在同一大区再次使用它，因为同样的动物不会重复听从你的召唤。

classFeature.name: Favored Enemy improvement
entries: 在14级时，你可以额外选择一个喜欢的敌人，以及一种相关的语言。你的选择应该反映你在冒险中遇到的怪物类型。

classFeature.name: Vanish
entries: Starting at 14th level, you can use the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on your turn. Also, you can't be tracked by nonmagical means, unless you choose to leave a trail.

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: 15级时，你获得游侠原型赋予你的一项功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 16th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: 在17级时，你会额外学习一种你选择的演习，该演习会从战斗大师原型的战士可用的演习列表中选择。

classFeature.name: Relentless
entries: 从17级开始，当你掷出主动权并且没有剩余的优势骰子时，你会重新获得1个优势骰子。

classFeature.name: Feral Senses
entries: At 18th level, you gain preternatural senses that help you fight creatures you can't see. When you attack a creature you can't see, your inability to see it doesn't impose disadvantage on your attack rolls against it. You are also aware of the location of any {@condition invisible} creature within 30 feet of you, provided that the creature isn't hidden from you and you aren't {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 19th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Foe Slayer
entries: 在20级的时候，你成为了一个无与伦比的猎杀敌人的人。在你的每个回合中，你可以将你的智慧修饰值加到你对你所喜爱的一个敌人的攻击卷或伤害卷上。你可以选择在卷轴之前或之后使用这个功能，但在卷轴的任何效果被应用之前。

classFeature.name: Ambuscade
entries: Rangers strike first and strike hard. When you roll initiative, you gain a special turn that takes place before other creatures can act. On this turn, you can use your action to take either the {@action Attack} or {@action Hide} action.
如果在一场遭遇战中，有一个以上的生物具有这个特征，它们都会按照主动权的顺序先行动，然后开始常规的主动权顺序。
If you would normally be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} at the start of an encounter, you are not {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} but you do not gain this extra turn.

classFeature.name: Skirmisher's Stealth
entries: 从2级开始，你在战斗中结合速度和隐身术，使自己难以被发现。你很难被发现，即使你攻击或采取其他通常会暴露你存在的行动。

At the start of your turn, pick a creature you are hidden from. You remain hidden from that creature during your turn, regardless of your actions or the actions of other creatures. As a bonus action at the end of your turn, you can make a Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check to hide again if you fulfill the conditions needed to hide. Otherwise, creatures are aware of you at the end of your turn.

classFeature.name: Spirit Path
entries: At 3rd level, you form a bond with a nature spirit—a companion forged by your link to the wild. This spirit companion protects you as you travel and watches your back in battle. You choose a ranger path that shapes your spirit companion and its magic: the Guardian, the Seeker, or the Stalker. Your choice grants you features at 3rd level and again at 7th, 11th, and 15th level.

entries.name: Spirit Companion
entries: 所有游侠都会获得一个精神伴侣和调用其魔力的能力。(在这个修订版游侠的游戏测试版本中，你的精神伴侣给予你一个可以召唤的好处，在更高的等级中获得更多的好处。) 当你完成短期或长期休息时，你会重新获得以这种方式召唤精神伴侣的能力。

Once per day as a bonus action, you can command your spirit companion to materialize as a living creature, determined by the ranger path you choose. Your spirit companion manifests as an animal for 1 minute or until your {@status concentration} is broken (as if you are {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell). You can also dismiss it as a bonus action.
被显化的生物在攻击卷和救赎动作上获得相当于你的智慧修正值的奖励。它使用动物状态块中的命中率或你最大命中率的一半，以较高者为准。
The manifested creature takes its turn on your initiative and acts immediately after you. You control its actions, even if you are {@condition unconscious} or otherwise unable to act.

classFeature.name: Favored Enemy
entries: 从1级开始，你有大量研究、追踪、狩猎的经验，甚至可以和荒野中常遇到的某类敌人交谈。

Choose a type of favored enemy: {@filter beasts|bestiary|type=beast}, {@filter fey|bestiary|type=fey}, {@filter humanoids|bestiary|type=humanoid}, {@filter monstrosities|bestiary|type=monstrosity}, or {@filter undead|bestiary|type=undead}. You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with weapon attacks against creatures of the chosen type. Additionally, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to track your favored enemies, as well as on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.
当你获得这个特性时，你也会学习一种你所选择的语言，通常是你喜欢的敌人或与之相关的生物所讲的语言。然而，你可以自由选择任何你想学习的语言。

classFeature.name: Natural Explorer
entries: 你是驾驭自然界的高手，当受到攻击时，你的反应是迅速而果断的。这使你获得以下好处。

items: You ignore {@quickref difficult terrain||3}.
你在主动权卷上有优势。
在战斗中的第一个回合，你对尚未行动的生物的攻击卷有优势。

entries: 此外，你还能熟练地在荒野中航行。当旅行一小时或更长时间时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 困难的地形不会减缓你的团队的旅行。
除非用魔法手段，否则你的小组不可能迷路。
即使你在旅行中从事另一项活动（如觅食、导航或追踪），你仍然对危险保持警惕。
如果你是独自旅行，你可以以正常的速度隐秘地移动。
当你觅食时，你会找到比平时多一倍的食物。
在追踪其他生物的同时，你还可以了解它们的确切数量、大小以及它们多久前经过该地区。

classFeature.name: Fighting Style
entries: 2级时，你采用一种特殊的战斗方式作为你的专长。从以下选项中选择一个。你不能多次选择一种格斗风格的选项，即使你后来可以再次选择。

classFeature.name: Martial Versatility
entries: {@i 2nd-level feature (enhances Fighting Style)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}
每当你在这个班级中获得一个等级，你就可以用你班级中可用的另一种风格取代你所知道的一种战斗风格。这种变化代表着你的武术训练和练习重点的转移，使你失去一种风格的好处而获得另一种风格的好处。

classFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: By the time you reach 2nd level, you have learned to use the magical essence of nature to cast spells, much as a druid does. See {@book chapter 10|PHB|10} for the general rules of spellcasting and {@book chapter 11|PHB|11} for the {@filter ranger spell list|spells|class=ranger}.

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: The Ranger table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your {@filter ranger spells|spells|class=ranger} of 1st level and higher. To cast one of these spells, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a long rest.
For example, if you know the 1st-level spell {@spell animal friendship} and have a 1st-level and a 2nd-level spell slot available, you can cast {@spell animal friendship} using either slot.

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st Level and Higher
entries: 你会从游侠的法术列表中选择两个一级法术。
游侠表中的 "已知法术 "一栏显示了你何时学习更多你选择的游侠法术。每个法术都必须是你有法术槽的等级。例如，当你在这个等级中达到5级时，你可以学习一个1级或2级的新法术。
此外，当你在这个等级中获得一个等级时，你可以从你所知道的游侠法术中选择一个，并用游侠法术列表中的另一个法术来代替它，这个法术也必须是你有法术槽的等级。

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your ranger spells, since your magic draws on your attunement to nature. You use your Wisdom whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. In addition, you use your Wisdom modifier when setting the saving throw DC for a ranger spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.

classFeature.name: Primeval Awareness
entries: 从3级开始，你对游侠传说的掌握使你能够与野兽和你周围的土地建立强大的联系。
你有一种与生俱来的能力，可以与野兽交流，它们会把你当成同类。通过声音和手势，你可以把简单的想法作为一种行动传达给野兽，并能读懂它的基本情绪和意图。你可以了解它的情绪状态，它是否受到任何一种魔法的影响，它的短期需求（比如食物或安全），以及你可以采取的行动（如果有的话）来说服它不要攻击。
你不能对在过去10分钟内被你攻击过的生物使用这个能力。

Additionally, you can attune your senses to determine if any of your favored enemies lurk nearby. By spending 1 uninterrupted minute in {@status concentration} (as if you were {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell), you can sense whether any of your favored enemies are present within 5 miles of you. This feature reveals which of your favored enemies are present, their numbers, and the creatures' general direction and distance (in miles) from you.
如果范围内有多组你喜欢的敌人，你就为每一组学习这个信息。

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave
entries: 在3级的时候，你可以从可用的宗派列表中选择效仿一个游侠宗派的理想和训练。你的选择会在3级时赋予你特性，在5级、7级、11级和15级时再次赋予你特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到四级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Martial Versatility
entries: {@i 4th-level ranger {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}
每当你在这个等级中达到授予能力值提升功能的等级时，你可以用游骑兵可用的另一种战斗方式来替换你所知道的战斗方式。这种替换代表了你在武术练习中的重心转移。

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 4th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave feature
entries: 在5级时，你获得了游侠协会授予你的一项功能。

classFeature.name: Greater Favored Enemy
entries: At 6th level, you are ready to hunt even deadlier game. Choose a type of greater favored enemy: {@filter aberrations|bestiary|type=aberration}, {@filter celestials|bestiary|type=celestial}, {@filter constructs|bestiary|type=construct}, {@filter dragons|bestiary|type=dragon}, {@filter elementals|bestiary|type=elemental}, {@filter fiends|bestiary|type=fiend}, or {@filter giants|bestiary|type=giant}. You gain all the benefits against this chosen enemy that you normally gain against your favored enemy, including an additional language. Your bonus to damage rolls against all your favored enemies increases to +4.
此外，你对一个更受宠的敌人所使用的法术和能力，在救赎上有优势。

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave feature
entries: 在第7级时，你获得了一个由你的游侠公会赋予你的功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Beginning at 8th level, you can use the {@action Dash} action as a bonus action on your turn.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 8th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Hide in Plain Sight
entries: 从10级开始，你可以长时间保持完全静止的状态来设下伏击。

When you attempt to hide on your turn, you can opt to not move on that turn. If you avoid moving, creatures that attempt to detect you take a -10 penalty to their Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks until the start of your next turn. You lose this benefit if you move or fall {@condition prone}, either voluntarily or because of some external effect. You are still automatically detected if any effect or action causes you to no longer be hidden.
如果你在下一回合仍被隐藏，你可以继续保持不动，并获得这个好处，直到你被发现。

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave feature
entries: 在11级时，你获得了一个由你的游侠公会授予你的功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 12th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

entries: Starting at 14th level, you can use the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on your turn. Also, you can't be tracked by nonmagical means, unless you choose to leave a trail.

entries: 在15级时，你获得了一个由你的游侠公会授予你的功能。

entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。

entries: {@i 16th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

When you attack a creature you can't see, your inability to see it doesn't impose disadvantage on your attack rolls against it. You are also aware of the location of any {@condition invisible} creature within 30 feet of you, provided that the creature isn't hidden from you and you aren't {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}.

entries: {@i 19th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}

这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Foe Slayer
entries: 在20级时，你成为一个无与伦比的猎人。在你的每个回合中，你可以将你的智慧修正值加到你所进行的攻击卷或伤害卷中。你可以选择在卷轴之前或之后使用这个功能，但在卷轴的任何效果被应用之前。

subclassFeature.name: Drakewarden
entries: 你与自然界的联系是以龙族精神的形式出现的，它可以以实体形式表现为一只公鸭。随着你力量的增长，你的龙也在增长，从一个四条腿的小伙伴变成了一个强大的有翅膀的生物，大到足以让你骑。一路走来，你获得了越来越多的龙的令人敬畏的力量。
Consider the source of the draconic spirit you have bonded with. The Drakewarden Origin table offers examples.

entries.caption: Drakewarden Origin
rows: 你研究了龙的鳞片或爪子，或者龙的囤积物中的饰品，通过该信物挥之不去的龙族魔法建立起你的纽带。
一个收集和守护龙人传说的秘密游侠组织向你传授了他们的方法。
一条龙给了你一块阳极石或宝石让你照顾。令你惊讶的是，这只小龙从那块石头中孵化出来。
你摄取了几滴龙血，永远为你的自然魔法注入了龙的力量。
当你大声朗读时，一块立在石头上的古老的德拉贡铭文给了你力量。
你做了一个生动的梦，梦见一个神秘的人物，身边有七只黄色的金丝雀，他们警告你即将到来的厄运。当你醒来时，你的德雷克就在那里，看着你。

subclassFeature.name: Draconic Gift
entries: {@i 3rd-level Drakewarden feature}
你与你的德雷克共享的纽带创造了与龙族的联系，赋予你理解力并赋予你的存在感。你会获得以下好处。

items.name: Thaumaturgy
items.entry: You learn the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip, which is a ranger spell for you.

items.name: Tongue of Dragons
items.entry: 你学会说、读、写德拉科尼语或你选择的一种其他语言。

subclassFeature.name: Drake Companion
entries: {@i 3rd-level Drakewarden feature}
作为一个行动，你可以用魔法召唤与你绑定的公鸭。它出现在你30英尺范围内你选择的一个无人的空间。

The drake is friendly to you and your companions, and it obeys your commands. See its game statistics in the accompanying {@creature Drake Companion|FTD} stat block, which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) in several places. Whenever you summon the drake, choose a damage type listed in its Draconic Essence trait. You can determine the cosmetic characteristics of the drake, such as its color, its scale texture, or any visible effect of its Draconic Essence; your choice has no effect on its game statistics.

In combat, the drake shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes on its turn is the {@action Dodge} action, unless you take a bonus action on your turn to command it to take another action. That action can be one in its stat block or some other action. If you are {@condition incapacitated}, the drake can take any action of its choice, not just {@action Dodge}.
这只公龙会一直存在，直到它的生命值降至0，直到你再次使用此功能召唤公龙，或者直到你死亡。德雷克消失时，它所穿戴或携带的任何东西都会被留下。
一旦你召唤出公鸭，你就不能再这样做，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，除非你消耗一个一级或更高级别的法术槽来召唤它。

subclassFeature.name: Bond of Fang and Scale
entries: {@i 7th-level Drakewarden feature}
你与你的公龙之间的联系会加强，保护你并激起公龙的怒火。当你召唤你的德雷克时，它的背上会长出翅膀，并获得相当于其步行速度的飞行速度。
此外，当你的德拉克被召唤时，你和德拉克会获得以下好处。

items.name: Drake Mount
entries: 这只公鸭成长为中等体型。反映你的特殊关系，如果你的体型是中等或更小，你可以把公鸭作为坐骑。当你骑着你的德雷克时，它不能使用这个功能的飞行速度。

items.name: Magic Fang
entries: The drake's Bite attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the type chosen for the drake's Draconic Essence.

items.name: Resistance
entries: 你获得对为德雷克的德雷克精华所选择的伤害类型的抵抗。

subclassFeature.name: Drake's Breath
entries: {@i 11th-level Drakewarden feature}

As an action, you can exhale a 30-foot cone of damaging breath or cause your drake to exhale it. Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage (your choice doesn't have to match your drake's Draconic Essence). Each creature in the cone must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC, taking {@damage 8d6} damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
This damage increases to {@dice 10d6} when you reach 15th level in this class.
一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再这样做了，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，除非你消耗一个3级以上的法术槽来再次使用它。

subclassFeature.name: Perfected Bond
entries: {@i 15th-level Drakewarden feature}
你与你的德雷克的结合达到了力量的巅峰。当你的德雷克被召唤时，你和德雷克获得以下好处。

items.name: Empowered Bite
entries: The drake's Bite attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the type chosen for its Draconic Essence (for a total of {@damage 2d6} extra damage).

items.name: Large Drake
entries: 鸭子成长为大号。当你骑着你的德雷克时，它不再被禁止使用方与鳞的结合的飞行速度。

items.name: Reflexive Resistance
entries: 当你或德雷克在30英尺范围内受到伤害时，你可以使用你的反应来使你自己或德雷克对该次伤害产生抵抗。你可以使用这个反应的次数与你的熟练度加成相等，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。

subclassFeature.name: Beast Master
entries: 野兽大师的原型体现了文明种族和世界上的野兽之间的友谊。野兽和游侠团结一致，共同对抗威胁文明和荒野的可怕敌人。模仿 "野兽大师 "的原型意味着将自己投入到这一理想中，作为动物的伙伴和朋友与之合作。

subclassFeature.name: Primal Companion
entries: {@i 3rd-level Beast Master variant feature, which replaces the Ranger's Companion feature}

You magically summon a primal beast, which draws strength from your bond with nature. The beast is friendly to you and your companions and obeys your commands. Choose its stat block—{@creature Beast of the Land|TCE}, {@creature Beast of the Sea|TCE}, or {@creature Beast of the Sky|TCE}—which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) in several places. You also determine the kind of animal the beast is, choosing a kind appropriate for the stat block. Whatever kind you choose, the beast bears primal markings, indicating its mystical origin.

In combat, the beast acts during your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes is the {@action Dodge} action, unless you take a bonus action on your turn to command it to take another action. That action can be one in its stat block or some other action. You can also sacrifice one of your attacks when you take the {@action Attack} action to command the beast to take the {@action Attack} action. If you are {@condition incapacitated}, the beast can take any action of its choice, not just {@action Dodge}.
如果这只野兽在过去一小时内死亡，你可以用你的行动来触摸它，并消耗一个一级或更高级别的法术槽。野兽在1分钟后恢复生命，其所有的命中率都会恢复。
当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你可以召唤一个不同的原始兽。新的野兽出现在你周围5英尺内的一个无人空间，你可以选择它的状态块和外观。如果你已经有一只来自此功能的野兽，当新的野兽出现时，它就会消失。如果你死亡，该野兽也会消失。

subclassFeature.name: Ranger Companion Options
entries: {@i 3rd-level Beast Master feature (enhances Ranger's Companion)}

While wandering the wilds, a ranger encounters many sorts of animals, some of which the ranger might befriend. This friendship can arise from successful use of the {@skill Animal Handling} skill or the {@spell animal friendship} spell. If the resulting bond is strong enough, the animal might join the ranger on adventures.

A ranger who has the Beast Master archetype can form an even stronger bond, feeling almost like a sibling to an animal. A special type of beast awaits a Beast Master in the wilds, a creature whose lineage stretches back to the beginnings of the world: a primal beast known as a {@creature Beast of the Air|UAClassFeatureVariants} or a {@creature Beast of the Earth|UAClassFeatureVariants}. Such a creature seeks out the type of companionship that a Beast Master offers, ready for the two of them to battle the imbalances in the natural world.
原始的野兽是一种特殊的生物，野兽大师可以为游侠的同伴特征选择这种生物。在选择这种生物时，你要决定它是空气之兽还是大地之兽，并决定它的外观。故事中描述的原始野兽会神秘地改变形态，与同伴的精神保持一致。
When a primal beast is met apart from a Beast Master, the creature takes the form a regular beast of challenge rating 1/4 or lower, as determined by the DM.

subclassFeature.name: Ranger's Companion
entries: You gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and is trained to fight alongside you. Choose a {@filter beast that is no larger than Medium and that has a challenge rating of 1/4 or lower|bestiary|challenge rating=[&0;&1/4]|type=beast|size=f;d;t;s;m|miscellaneous=!swarm}. Add your proficiency bonus to the beast's AC, attack rolls, and damage rolls, as well as to any saving throws and skills it is proficient in. Its hit point maximum equals its normal maximum or four times your ranger level, whichever is higher. Like any creature, the beast can spend Hit Dice during a short rest.

The beast obeys your commands as best as it can. It takes its turn on your initiative. On your turn, you can verbally command the beast where to move (no action required by you). You can use your action to verbally command it to take the {@action Attack}, {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Help} action. If you don't issue a command, the beast takes the {@action Dodge} action. Once you have the Extra Attack feature, you can make one weapon attack yourself when you command the beast to take the {@action Attack} action.

If you are {@condition incapacitated} or absent, your beast companion acts on its own, focusing on protecting you and itself. It never requires your command to use its reaction, such as when making an opportunity attack.
当只带着野兽在你喜欢的地形上旅行时，你可以以正常的速度隐秘地移动。
如果这只野兽死了，你可以通过花8小时与另一只对你没有敌意的野兽进行魔法结合来获得另一只，可以是与之前相同类型的野兽，也可以是不同的野兽。

subclassFeature.name: Exceptional Training
entries: Beginning at 7th level, on any of your turns when your beast companion doesn't attack, you can use a bonus action to command the beast to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Help} action on its turn. In addition, the beast's attacks now count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

subclassFeature.name: Bestial Fury
entries: Starting at 11th level, when you command your beast companion to take the {@action Attack} action, the beast can make two attacks, or it can take the Multiattack action if it has that action.

subclassFeature.name: Share Spells
entries: 从15级开始，当你以自己为目标施法时，如果你的野兽在你30英尺以内，你也可以用该法术影响你的野兽伙伴。

subclassFeature.name: Hunter
entries: 模仿猎人的原型意味着接受你作为文明和荒野恐怖之间的堡垒的地位。当你走在猎人的道路上时，你会学习专门的技术来对抗你所面临的威胁，从猖獗的食人魔和成群的兽人到高大的巨人和可怕的龙。

subclassFeature.name: Horde Breaker
entries: 在你的每个回合中，当你进行武器攻击时，你可以用相同的武器对一个在原目标5英尺范围内且在你的武器范围内的不同生物进行另一次攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Hunter's Prey
entries: 在3级时，你获得你所选择的以下特征之一。

subclassFeature.name: Colossus Slayer
entries: Your tenacity can wear down the most potent foes. When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, the creature takes an extra {@damage 1d8} damage if it's below its hit point maximum. You can deal this extra damage only once per turn.

subclassFeature.name: Giant Killer
entries: 当你周围5英尺内的大型或更大的生物用攻击击中或未击中你时，你可以使用你的反应在该生物的攻击后立即攻击它，只要你能看到该生物。

subclassFeature.name: Defensive Tactics
entries: 在第7级时，你获得你所选择的以下特征之一。

subclassFeature.name: Escape the Horde
entries: 对你的机会性攻击是以劣势进行的。

subclassFeature.name: Multiattack Defense
entries: 当一个生物用攻击击中你时，你会在剩下的回合中对该生物随后的所有攻击获得一个+4的攻击力奖励。

subclassFeature.name: Steel Will
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

subclassFeature.name: Multiattack
entries: 在11级时，你获得你所选择的以下特征之一。

subclassFeature.name: Volley
entries: 你可以用你的行动对你的武器范围内你能看到的10英尺范围内的任何数量的生物进行一次远程攻击。你必须为每个目标准备弹药，就像平时一样，而且你要为每个目标进行单独的攻击卷。

subclassFeature.name: Whirlwind Attack
entries: 你可以用你的行动对你周围5英尺内的任何数量的生物进行近战攻击，对每个目标进行单独的攻击卷。

subclassFeature.name: Evasion
entries: You can nimbly dodge out of the way of certain area effects, such as a red dragon's fiery breath or a {@spell lightning bolt} spell. When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

subclassFeature.name: Stand Against the Tide
entries: 当一个敌对的生物用近战攻击错过你时，你可以用你的反应迫使该生物对你选择的另一个生物（除其自身外）重复同样的攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
entries: 在15级时，你获得你所选择的以下特征之一。

subclassFeature.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: 当一个你能看到的攻击者用攻击击中你时，你可以用你的反应使攻击对你的伤害减半。

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer
entries: 围绕着你的是一种精灵的神秘感，这要归功于一位大神的恩赐，你从一棵会说话的树上吃下的闪亮的果实，你在其中游泳的魔法泉水，或者其他一些吉祥的事件。无论你如何获得你的精灵魔法，你现在是一个精灵流浪者，一个同时代表凡人和精灵界的游侠。当你在多元宇宙中游荡时，你欢快的笑声照亮了被压迫者的心，你的武功让你的敌人感到恐惧，因为精灵的欢笑是伟大的，他们的愤怒是可怕的。

subclassFeature.name: Dreadful Strikes
entries: {@i 3rd-level Fey Wanderer feature}

You can augment your weapon strikes with mind-scarring magic, drawn from the gloomy hollows of the Feywild. When you hit a creature with a weapon, you can deal an extra {@damage 1d4} psychic damage to the target, which can take this extra damage only once per turn.
The extra damage increases to {@dice 1d6} when you reach 11th level in this class.

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer Magic
entries: {@i 3rd-level Fey Wanderer feature}
当你在这个等级中达到一定的等级时，你会额外学习一个法术，如精灵流浪者法术表所示。每个法术对你来说都算作游侠法术，但不计入你所会的游侠法术数量。
你还拥有一个来自精灵盟友或精灵力量之地的超自然祝福。从 "仙界礼物 "表中选择你的祝福，或随机确定它。

entries.caption: Feywild Gifts
rows: 虚幻的蝴蝶在你身边飞来飞去，而你要进行短期或长期的休息。
每当黎明时分，新鲜的季节性花朵就会从你的头发上萌发出来。
你隐约闻到肉桂、薰衣草、肉豆蔻或另一种令人舒适的草药或香料。
你的影子在没有人直视的情况下跳舞。
犄角或鹿角从你的头上长出。
你的皮肤和头发在每个黎明都会改变颜色，以配合季节的变化。

subclassFeature.name: Otherworldly Glamour
entries: {@i 3rd-level Fey Wanderer feature}
你的特质给了你一种超自然的魅力。因此，每当你进行魅力检查时，你会获得与你的智慧修饰值相等的检查奖励（最低为+1）。
In addition, you gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Deception}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}.

subclassFeature.name: Beguiling Twist
entries: {@i 7th-level Fey Wanderer feature}
The magic of the Feywild guards your mind. You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

In addition, whenever you or a creature you can see within 120 feet of you succeeds on a saving throw against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, you can use your reaction to force a different creature you can see within 120 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. If the save fails, the target is {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} by you (your choice) for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

subclassFeature.name: Fey Reinforcements
entries: {@i 11th-level Fey Wanderer feature}

The royal courts of the Feywild have blessed you with the assistance of fey beings: you know {@spell summon fey|tce}. It doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know, and you can cast it without a material component. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.
Whenever you start casting the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn't require {@status concentration}. If you do so, the spell's duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.

subclassFeature.name: Misty Wanderer
entries: {@i 15th-level Fey Wanderer feature}

You can slip in and out of the Feywild to move in a blink of an eye: you can cast {@spell misty step} without expending a spell slot. You can do so a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

In addition, whenever you cast {@i misty step}, you can bring along one willing creature you can see within 5 feet of you. That creature teleports to an unoccupied space of your choice within 5 feet of your destination space.

subclassFeature.name: Swarmkeeper
entries: 感受到与周围环境的深刻联系，一些游侠通过他们与世界的神奇联系，与一群自然之灵结合。蜂群在战斗中成为一种强大的力量，同时也是游侠的好伙伴。有些蜂群守护者是被遗弃者或隐士，他们只与自己和随行的蜂群待在一起，而不去处理其他人的不愉快。其他的蜂群守护者则喜欢建立充满活力的社区，为所有他们认为是蜂群一部分的人的共同利益工作。

subclassFeature.name: Gathered Swarm
entries: {@i 3rd-level Swarmkeeper feature}
一群无形的自然之灵已经与你结合在一起，可以在战斗中协助你。当你活着的时候，这群自然精灵会留在你的空间里，在你身上爬行或者在你的空间里围绕你飞行和滑行。你决定它的外观，或者你通过在虫群外观表上滚动产生它的外观。
在你的每个回合中，你可以在你用攻击击中一个生物之后，立即使蜂群以下列方式之一协助你。

items: The attack's target takes {@damage 1d6} piercing damage from the swarm.
The attack's target must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be moved by the swarm up to 15 feet horizontally in a direction of your choice.
你会被蜂群在你选择的方向上水平移动5英尺。

entries.name: It's Your Swarm
entries: A Swarmkeeper's swarm and spells are reflections of the character's bond with nature spirits. Take the opportunity to describe the swarm and the ranger's magic in play. For example, when your ranger casts gaseous form, they might appear to melt into the swarm, instead of a cloud of mist, or the {@spell arcane eye} spell could create an extension of your swarm that spies for you. Such descriptions don't change the effects of spells, but they are an exciting opportunity to explore your character's narrative through their class abilities. For more guidance on customizing spells, see the "Personalizing Spells" section in chapter 3.
另外，请记住，精灵群的外观是由你来定制的，不要觉得被限制在一个单一的外观里。也许这些精灵的外观会随着游侠的心情或季节的变化而变化。你自己决定吧。

subclassFeature.name: Swarmkeeper Magic
entries: {@i 3rd-level Swarmkeeper feature}
You learn the {@spell mage hand} cantrip if you don't already know it. When you cast it, the hand takes the form of your swarming nature spirits.
当你在这个等级中达到一定级别时，你还会额外学习一个1级或更高的法术，如群居者法术表所示。每个法术对你来说都算作游侠法术，但不计入你所会的游侠法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Writhing Tide
entries: {@i 7th-level Swarmkeeper feature}

You can condense part of your swarm into a focused mass that lifts you up. As a bonus action, you gain a flying speed of 10 feet and can hover. This effect lasts for 1 minute or until you are {@condition incapacitated}.
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的熟练度加成相等，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。

subclassFeature.name: Mighty Swarm
entries: {@i 11th-level Swarmkeeper feature}
你所聚集的蜂群在以下方面变得更加强大。

items: The damage of Gathered Swarm increases to {@dice 1d8}.
If a creature fails its saving throw against being moved by Gathered Swarm, you can also cause the swarm to knock the creature {@condition prone}.
当你被集结的蜂群移动时，它能给你一半的掩护，直到你下一回合开始。

subclassFeature.name: Swarming Dispersal
entries: {@i 15th-level Swarmkeeper feature}
你可以融入你的蜂群，避开危险。当你受到伤害时，你可以用你的反应来使自己对该伤害产生抵抗。你消失在你的蜂群中，然后传送到一个你能看到的30英尺内无人的地方，在那里你和蜂群一起重新出现。
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的熟练度加成相等，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer
entries: 作为一名费伊流浪者，你守卫着费伊界和物质界的边界，引导迷失者离开费伊界，并防止危险的费伊人破坏物质界。你在这两个领域的经验使你成为这些世界的居民之间的杰出谈判者，因为你既了解人形的心态，也了解费伊人法庭的诡计。
翡冷翠流浪者拥有一个来自翡冷翠盟友或翡冷翠力量之地的超自然祝福。从 "仙界礼物 "表中选择你的祝福，或随机确定它。

entries.caption: Feywild Gifts
rows: 虚幻的蝴蝶在你身边飞来飞去，而你要进行短期或长期的休息。
每当黎明时分，新鲜的季节性花朵就会从你的头发上萌发出来。
你隐约闻到肉桂、薰衣草、肉豆蔻或另一种令人舒适的草药或香料。
你的影子在没有人直视的情况下跳舞。
精致的角或鹿角从你的头上冒出来。
你的皮肤和头发在每个黎明都会改变颜色，以配合季节的变化。

subclassFeature.name: Cunning Will
entries: {@i 3rd-level Fey Wanderer feature}
Your experience with the fey has guarded your mind and sharpened your tongue. You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.
In addition, you gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Deception}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}.

subclassFeature.name: Dreadful Strikes
entries: {@i 3rd-level Fey Wanderer feature}

You augment your attacks with mind-scarring magic, drawn from the gloomy hollows of the unseelie fey. You gain a bonus action that you can use to imbue the weapon, or weapons, you're currently holding with magic. Until the end of the turn, the weapons are magical, and they deal an extra {@damage 1d6} psychic damage on a hit. A creature can take this extra damage only once per turn.
当你进行双武器战斗时，你可以将你的武器作为你用来进行攻击的同一个奖励动作的一部分来灌输。

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer Magic
entries: {@i 3rd-level Fey Wanderer feature}
当你在这个等级中达到一定的等级时，你会学习一个额外的法术，如费恩流浪者法术表所示。这个法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你所会的游侠法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Blessings of the Courts
entries: {@i 7th-level Fey Wanderer feature}

You have learned eerie techniques from both the Gloaming Court and the Summer Court of the Feywild. Once during each of your turns, when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend a spell slot to deal extra psychic damage. The extra damage is {@damage 3d6} psychic damage and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn.
此外，每当你进行魅力检查时，你都会获得相当于你的智慧修正值的检查奖励。

subclassFeature.name: Beguiling Twist
entries: {@i 11th-level Fey Wanderer feature}

You learn how to manipulate mind-altering magic, channeling it from your allies toward others. Whenever a creature you can see within 120 feet of you succeeds on a saving throw against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, you can use your reaction to force a different creature you can see within 120 feet of you to succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or suffer your choice of one of the following effects:

items: The creature is {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} by you (your choice) for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.
The creature takes {@damage 3d10} psychic damage.

subclassFeature.name: Misty Presence
entries: {@i 15th-level Fey Wanderer feature}

You can magically remove yourself from one creature's perception: you gain a bonus action that you can use to force a creature you can see within 30 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the target can't see or hear you for 24 hours. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of any turn during which you hit it with an attack roll, forced it to make a saving throw, or dealt damage to it. The effect ends early if you use this bonus action again. On a successful save, the target is immune to this feature for 7 days.
一旦你使用了这个奖励动作，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，或者直到你消耗一个四级以上的法术槽来再次使用它。

subclassFeature.name: Drakewarden
entries: Drakewardens are rangers who use their magical connection with nature to form an enduring bond with a minor dragon, a drake. This bond allows the ranger to summon the drake to their side and to share in the awe-inspiring power wielded by dragons. Consider how your ranger gained their bond with the drake. The Drakewarden Origin table offers some examples.

entries.caption: Drakewarden Origin
rows: 你研究了龙的鳞片或爪子，或者它囤积的饰品，并通过信物挥之不去的龙族魔法建立了你的纽带。
一个收集和守护龙人传说的秘密游侠组织向你传授了他们的方法。
一条真龙给了你一个龙蛋让你照顾。当它孵化时，这只母龙与你结合。
你喝了几滴龙血，永远为你的自然魔法注入龙的力量。
An ancient {@language Draconic} inscription on a standing stone empowered you when you read it aloud.
你做了一个生动的梦，梦见一个神秘的人，身边有七只黄色的金丝雀，他警告你即将到来的厄运。当你醒来时，你的德雷克就在那里，看着你。

subclassFeature.name: Draconic Gift
entries: {@i 3rd-level Drakewarden feature}
你与你的德雷克共享的纽带创造了与龙类更深的联系，赋予你理解力并赋予你的存在感。你会获得以下好处。

items: If you can't already, you learn to speak, read, and write {@language Draconic}.
You learn the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip, which is a ranger spell for you.

subclassFeature.name: Drake Companion
entries: {@i 3rd-level Drakewarden feature}
你可以用魔法召唤绑定在你身上的公鸭。作为一个行动，你可以召唤公牛，它出现在你选择的、你能看到的30英尺范围内的一个无人空间。

The drake is friendly to you and your companions and obeys your commands. See its game statistics in the {@creature Drake Companion|UA2020SubclassesPt5} stat block, which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) in several places. When you summon the drake, choose a damage type listed in its Draconic Essence trait. You can determine the cosmetic characteristics of the drake such as its color, scale texture, or any visible effect of its Draconic Essence; your choice has no effect on its game statistics.

In combat, the drake shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes on its turn is the {@action Dodge} action, unless you take a bonus action on your turn to command it to take another action. That action can be one in its stat block or some other action. If you are {@condition incapacitated}, the drake can take any action of its choice, not just {@action Dodge}.
一旦你召唤出公鸭，你就不能再这样做，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，除非你消耗一个一级或更高级别的法术槽来召唤它。
这只渡鸦会停留数小时，时间与你的熟练度加成相等，直到它的命中率降为0，直到你再次使用此功能召唤渡鸦，或者直到你死亡。德雷克消失时，它所穿戴或携带的任何东西都会被留下。

subclassFeature.name: Bond of Fang and Scale
entries: {@i 7th-level Drakewarden feature}
你与你的公牛之间的联系会加强，保护你并激起公牛的怒火。当你的龙骑兵被召唤时，你和龙骑兵获得以下好处。

items: 你获得对为德雷克的德雷克精华所选择的伤害类型的抵抗。
Choose one of the following: the drake gains a swimming speed of 40 feet and can breathe both air and water, or the drake grows wings and gains a flying speed of 40 feet.
The drake's bite attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the type chosen for its Draconic Essence.

subclassFeature.name: Drake's Breath
entries: {@i 11th-level Drakewarden feature}

As an action, you can exhale a 30-foot cone of damaging breath or cause your drake to exhale it. Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage. Each creature in the cone must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC, taking {@damage 6d6} damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
This damage increases to {@dice 8d6} when you reach 15th level in this class.
一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再这样做了，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，除非你消耗一个3级以上的法术槽来再次使用它。

subclassFeature.name: Perfected Bond
entries: {@i 15th-level Drakewarden feature}
你与你的德雷克的结合达到了力量的巅峰。当你的德雷克被召唤时，你和德雷克获得以下好处。

items: 鸭子长到大尺寸。
The drake's bite attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the type chosen for its Draconic Essence (for a total of {@damage 2d6} extra damage).
当你或德雷克在彼此30英尺范围内受到伤害时，你可以用你的反应使自己或德雷克对该次伤害产生抵抗。

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer
entries: 屠夫协会的游侠们寻找吸血鬼、龙、邪恶的费伊、魔人和其他强大的魔法威胁。为了战胜这些怪物，杀手们接受了各种奥术和神术的训练，他们是发掘和击败强大敌人的专家。

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Eye
entries: 从第三级开始，你获得研究和解开生物防御的能力。作为一个额外动作，在你120英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物。你会立即了解目标的弱点、免疫力和抵抗力。你还可以了解目标受到伤害时触发的任何特殊效果，例如火伤害会停止其再生。
In addition, the first time each turn you hit the target with a weapon attack, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} damage from the weapon.
这个好处一直持续到你用这个特征瞄准一个不同的生物，或者直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Mysticism
entries: 当你在这个等级中达到一定级别时，你会额外学习一个法术，如杀手法术表所示。这个法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你所会的游侠法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Supernatural Defense
entries: At 7th level, you gain extra resilience against your prey's assaults on your mind and body. Whenever the target of your Slayer's Eye forces you to make a saving throw, add {@dice 1d6} to your roll.

subclassFeature.name: Relentless Slayer
entries: 11级时，你获得了挫败敌人逃跑能力的能力。你对民间传说和奥术知识的研究给了你一个关键的洞察力，使你的猎物被困住。如果你的杀手之眼的目标试图传送、改变形状、前往另一个存在平面或变成气态，你可以用你的反应来进行智慧检定，由目标做出的智慧检定来争夺。要使用这个能力，你必须能够看到目标，并且需要在它的30英尺以内。如果你成功了，你就挫败了它的尝试，导致它浪费了它所使用的行动、额外行动或反应。

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Counter
entries: 15级时，当你的猎物试图破坏你时，你获得反击的能力。如果你的 "杀手之眼 "的目标迫使你做一个蓄力动作，你可以用你的反应对它进行一次武器攻击。你在进行蓄力之前立即进行这次攻击。如果攻击命中，你的救赎自动成功，此外还有攻击的正常效果。

subclassFeature.name: Swarmkeeper
entries: 一些游侠觉得自己与周围的世界有很深的联系，他们通过与自然界的神奇联系，聚集了大量的精灵，它们以群居动物的形式出现--无论是嗡嗡叫的昆虫、飞翔的鸟儿、滑溜溜的鱿鱼，还是其他。蜂群在战斗中成为一股强大的力量，同时也是游侠的好帮手--尽管有可能是令人不安的--伙伴。有些蜂群守护者是被遗弃者或隐士，他们把自己和随行的蜂群关在一起，而不是去处理别人的不愉快。其他的蜂群守护者则喜欢建立充满活力的社区，为所有他们认为属于他们的蜂群的人的共同利益工作。

subclassFeature.name: Gathered Swarm
entries: {@i 3rd-level Swarmkeeper feature}
你神奇地吸引了一群看起来像你选择的小兽的精灵。这群精灵会留在你的空间里，在你身上或通过你的衣服爬行，或在你的空间里立即围绕你飞行和滑行。

As a bonus action, you can agitate the swarm for 1 minute. For the duration, some of the swarm clings to your weapons or follows your strikes when you attack: once during each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can deal an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage to that creature, and the swarm moves the creature up to 5 feet toward you or away from you (your choice). At 11th level, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d6}.
你可以使用这个功能的次数等于你的智慧修改器（最少一次），而且当你完成一个长距离休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。

subclassFeature.name: Swarmkeeper Magic
entries: {@i 3rd-level Swarmkeeper feature}

You learn the {@spell mage hand} cantrip if you don't already know it. When you cast it, the hand takes the form of swarming nature spirits. You also learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Swarmkeeper Spells table. These spells count as ranger spells for you, but don't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

subclassFeature.name: Writhing Tide
